{"py/object": "helper.questionhelper.Question", "qid": 2, "marks": "4", "qText": "Read all the files from the folder covid3monthintervaldata. For plotting, use parameters (column =  the column that has the total count, vmin= the minimum value polygon among all the polygon for all the months, vmax = the maximum value polygon from all the polygons for all the months, cmap='Reds').
